Articles.Content: So I decided to get USI but when I ran game with it installed, I was missing a ton of parts from the mod. The inflatable units and specific units specifically. And yes, I have tried using a stock game as well. I don't know if I am missing any mods, it is supposed to be this way, or I missed something. Any help would be appreciated, Thanks
Go into GameData/000_USITools and check USITools.version. If VERSION doesn't say 0,10,1,0, replace your USITools folder with this newer release  and it should fix the issue.
